display_long_description:
Welcome to the wild world of Arcade Ranger! Get ready to squad up, customize every corner of your arcade, and bring the heat in this epic multiplayer adventure. Are you ready to face the craziest arcade battles and prove you’re the GOAT Arcade Ranger? Step up and show the Game Over Gang who’s in charge!

🌎 **Enter Mixed Reality**- Step Into Your Arcade! Blend the real and virtual worlds in thrilling Mixed Reality!
[media]
🛠 **Build and Customize Your Dream Arcade!** Arrange cabinets, change looks, hang posters—it’s your arcade, your rules!
[media]
👫 **Multiplayer Madness** – Team Up and Get Messy! Team up with friends! Fix, clean, and fight off the Game Over Gang. Cooperation and chaos!
[media]
🔥 **Arcade Mayhem** – Fix, Clean, and Defend Your Turf!
[media]
🚀 **Wacky Shenanigans** - Shoot, Throw, and Go Wild! Feeling stressed? Let loose! Shoot, throw, and have a blast!
[media]

**Key Features**

- Build your dream arcade—place machines, posters, and pick the soundtrack.

- Team up with friends—defend and have fun together.

- Build, clean, and fight—save your arcade from chaos.

- Go wild—resize, throw, and have fun.

- Rise up—be the ultimate Arcade Ranger.

Experience the Arcade Like Never Before

Arcade Ranger supports X-Arcade's Arcade2TV-XR to bring an authentic arcade experience to your home. Enjoy enhanced control for 2D games, blending precision with the nostalgia of classic arcades.

Important Note:
External emulators and legal ROMs are required for certain games. For guidance, join our Discord community!
